description: Statement of Subscriptions to Capital Stock and Voting Power.  Latest information about voting power is available at http://go.worldbank.org/VKVDQDUC10.  A portion of capital subscriptions paid in to IBRD has been paid in the national currencies of the members. These amounts, referred to as restricted currencies, are usable by IBRD in its lending and investment operations, only with consent of the respective members, and for administrative expenses.
